title: Is centrism a purely negative political position? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think this is a position that is actually a confused left wing position, where someone has fallen for the propaganda that comes from the left but can see the flaws in left wing ideas. Or, someone who has fallen for the line that believing in the free market means you are selfish or greedy. Or, even worse, conflates “Far Right” with someone who has strongly free market views whilst simultaneously believing in the totalitarian/socialist ideas of Facists. But they are aware of the misery and carnage that is the history of the left. In others words, it’s a problem with definitions of Left vs Right.
